title: I Use ONLY "Amazon's Choice" Crap To Upgrade My Gaming PC...
description: *Sponsor* Check out the new CORSAIR RM850x SHIFT Power Supply! link:  (Amazon affiliate)  I decide to use Amazon Choice recommendations ONLY when upgrading the Cheapest Amazon PC I built last week!  Here are the "Amazon's Choice" product links from the products in the video (Affiliate) RGB Fans:  Sleeved Cables:  Thermal Paste:  SSD:  RGB Strip:  CPU Cooler:  GPU:  PSU:   Get some AWESOME Dawid T-shirts, Mouse pads and more here:   Play some Minecraft on the Dawid Does Minecraft server courtesy of our friends at Linode!
